column4: Ever since I upgraded to 10.10 from 10.4 I keep getting prompted for an update for Krita but it will not allow me to select it and Krita doesn't open either

some things can break on updates in ubuntu, I suggest next time you build from scratch to put /home on a separate partition than / then you can install from scratch on the update without losing your stuff in /home
major upgrades or software changes in the repo
